# Tajaran
Tajara are a species of omnivorous, bipedal humanoids with features strongly resembling Terran felines. Their most distinguishing traits include a layer of fur, large ears atop their heads, and a tail that aids in balance. They hail from the icy moon of [color=turquoise]Ahdomai[/color], only relatively recently making their debut on the galactic stage. Originally a clan-centric society, Tajara endured centuries of dictatorial rule. Following a civil war, their government fractured, and power returned to the clans, where it remains to this day.
## Mechanics
Due to their [color=yellow]small stature[/color], Tajara [color=#ec65a65a]take 65% more Brute damage[/color], but they can also [color=#65e65ff]fit into duffel bags[/color].
Their layer of fur gives them some [color=#65e65ff]resistance to Cold[/color], at the cost of [color=#ec65a65a]taking more Heat damage[/color]
They use their claws for unarmed attacks, dealing [color=#ec65a65a]Slashing[/color] and [color=#ec65a65a]Piercing[/color] damage.
Thanks to their innate agility, they [color=#65e65ff]take reduced damage from impacts or falls[/color], and their soft feet allow them to [color=#65e65ff]walk shoeless without making noise[/color].
